channel.title: Help With Menu
channel.description:
well im trying to add to a menu and this is what it has [code] sendQuest("@gre@To Contact Buzzman1992", 8156); sendQuest("@gre@Aim: Buzzm4n1992", 8157); sendQuest("@gre@Msn: Buzzman1992", 8158); [/code]
But i keep getting this error...
[code] client.java:6360: illegal character: \96 ` sendQuest("@gre@To Contact Buzzman1992", 8156); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Help With Menu
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

you have a ’ before the sendquest@gre@to contact

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Menu
item.dc:creator: @buzzman1992 buzzman1992
item.description:
@buzzman1992 wrote:

[code]yea this is added on from a menu like this…

public void MainHelpMenu()
{
if(playerRights < 4){

				sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to Buzzscape!", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Type ::welcome BEFORE PLAYING", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150);
                                    sendQuest("@red@===Ure Pk Stats===", 8151);
                                    sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152);
                                    sendQuest("@whi@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153);
                                    sendQuest("@whi@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154);

` sendQuest("@gre@To Contact Buzzman1992", 8156);
sendQuest("@gre@Aim: Buzzm4n1992", 8157);
sendQuest("@gre@Msn: Buzzman1992", 8158);
sendQuest("@gre@Yahoo: Buzzman1992@yahoo.com", 8158);
sendQuest("@gre@More Used E-mail: Jsthelen@comcast.net", 8159);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
[/code]

Read full topic
